title: ApprovalRequired
description: RIG Tool Protocol (RTP) Approval Required payload. Returned when a tool call requires explicit approval.

token.description: Approval token to be used with the approve/deny endpoints.

tool_name.description: Name of the tool requiring approval.

risk_class.description: Risk class that triggered the approval requirement.

args.description: Sanitized arguments for the tool call (secrets redacted).

requested_at.description: ISO 8601 timestamp when approval was requested.

expires_at.description: ISO 8601 timestamp when the approval token expires.
